elements.name: lndgRootText
elements.html:
This survey asks detailed questions about your experience with laryngeal paralysis and how it affected your companion animal's life.

We know how hard it is to lose one's beloved companion. If you're still grieving from the loss, maybe it's best to do the survey later when you've had time to heal.

elements.name: lndgCrossedOverText
elements.html: If you think you'd like to continue, please tell us your companion's name and if your companion has crossed over the Rainbow Bridge. This will allow us to personalize the survey to your individual situation.

elements.name: lndgCmpnName
elements.title: Please tell us your companion's name:

elements.name: lndgCrossedOver
elements.title: Has your companion crossed over the Rainbow Bridge?

elements.name: lndgMakeSelection
elements.html: Once you've made your selection, please choose 'Next' to begin the survey.
